description.narrative: Increased knowledge and ability of girls and adolescents, particularly out-of-school indigenous girls in rural areas, to demand social services,which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Education â€“ General, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Human Rights Institutions, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Increased capacity of CONJUVE to promote adolescent participation, in particular of disadvantaged children, to develop their skills and opportunities to participate in decision making processes.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased knowledge and ability of girls and adolescents, particularly out-of-school indigenous girls in rural areas, to demand social services

description.narrative: Con una cobertura de 7,544 adolescentes y jóvenes (37% hombres y 63% mujeres) en 25 municipios de 12 departamentos, UNICEF a través de Paz Joven, facilitó la formación y participación adolescente y juvenil en procesos de auditoría social y participación política, ante instancias como los Consejos Municipales de la Juventud, Consejos Departamentales y Municipales de Desarrollo y Mesas Técnicas del PLANEA 2018-2022, a nivel nacional, departamental y municipal. La formación, a través de una metodología de pares, incluyó temas como derechos sexuales y reproductivos, prevención del embarazo en adolescentes, prevención del VIH, prevención del Zika y actividades de educación ambiental. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:09/02/2020

title.narrative: Existence of a multi-sectoral, adolescent policy/action plan (reflecting sectoral commitments for adolescents)
